body:
Georg,

You have eased my mind a whole heap.  After giving it a try for myself, i
am now agreeing with you that the -i option of rpict does produce incident
irradiance values.  I haven't yet tried this out on a visualisation
including specular highlights, but have no reason to believe that the
specular highlights will appear and make the results meaningless.

Seems that, without looking into the source code, i was mislead by the
(all-too-brief) explanation in the Radiance manual.

Thanks again,
Phil G.
